questionTitle: The weather might prevent Richard .............. getting to Minneapolis on time.

For over fifteen years she has been happily married ....................... Richard .

I got to school on time ....................... I had missed my bus.
I couldn't resist having another slice of cake even .....................  I was supposed to be losing weight.
Leave it in the oven until it ..................... brown.
How much does it .............................. to repair my motorbike?
When he was in his teens, he already had the ............................ to become a famous salesman.
My sister had a baby daughter yesterday, and she is my first ..................
They were listening to the radio when electricity ........................
Nam was the only student ....................... I saw at the conference.
There .................... some furniture in the house.
